posts.name: 9401 Lead mentor/Drive Coach
posts.cooked:
This is 9401’s baseline CAD at the end of week 5. Our goal is to be able to fill any role for our alliance while being able to achieve all 6 ranking points per match. We will be able to manipulate both algae and coral, score in L1-L4 as well the barge and processor and ending with a deep climb. Our signature feature is our ground coral intake funnel mechanism.

Screenshot 2025-02-08 at 3.26.54 PM 1342×1180 103 KB

Screenshot 2025-02-08 at 3.26.54 PM 1342×1180 103 KB

Screenshot 2025-02-08 at 3.26.54 PM 1342×1180 103 KB

posts.name: Wolly :)
posts.cooked: Very cool!! Would love to see some images of it in different configurations (ie. at coral station, intaking coral, scoring, climbing) if possible

posts.name: 9401 Lead mentor/Drive Coach
posts.cooked: Here is the link to our public CAD: Onshape

posts.name: Prince
posts.cooked: Thank you looking forward to seeing you at PLR

posts.name: Prince
posts.cooked: How did reducing the rollers to churros help you guys with coral centering in your funnel

So those are not churros just really thin aluminum tubes that are used for weight reduction. going across them is some 1/16 in polycarb so that the coral will slide into place. We will add a picture shortly
